text: Vida Akoto Banfo (born 7 February 1949) is a Ghanaian Justice of the Supreme Court of Ghana ==Early life and education== She had her legal training at the University of Ghana, where she obtained her LLB in 1972, and at the Ghana School of Law, where she had her Qualifying certificate. ==Personal life== Vida is a Christian. ==References== Category:Ghanaian women judges Category:University of Ghana alumni Category:Ghanaian Christians Category:Living people Category:1949 births Category:Ghana School of Law alumni
title: Vida Akoto Bamfo
